title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1beta1\AudioStream\AudioAtom\AudioChannel\AudioChannelInput
name: AudioChannelInput
description:
Identifies which input file, track, and channel should be used.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1beta1.AudioStream.AudioAtom.AudioChannel.AudioChannelInput

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.key
params.description: Required. The Input.key that identifies the input file.

params.name: data.track
params.description: Required. The zero-based index of the track in the input file.

params.name: data.channel
params.description: Required. The zero-based index of the channel in the input file.

params.name: data.gain_db
params.description: Audio volume control in dB. Negative values decrease volume, positive values increase. The default is 0.
